PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-15692009-09-16,  ,  ,  ,  ,  HERITAGE
ActBroadcasting Act
SubjectOrder requesting CRTC to hold hearings and issue a report on the implications and advisability of implementing a compensation for the value of the local television signal regime
PrecisOrder requesting the CRTC to hold hearings on the implications and the advisability of implementing a compensation for the value of the local television signal regime and issue to government, as soon as practicable, a report providing recommendations.
AttachmentsAttachment
